Pre-Apocalypse[]: Hanson was a captain in the Atlanta Police Department . His second-in-command was Lt. Dawn Lerner who, sometime before the outbreak, presented her an award for her work with the Atlanta Police Department.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Hanson was mentioned by Dr. Steven Edwards as the commanding officer who was tasked with evacuating Grady Memorial Hospital with Dawn Lerner and other Atlanta Police Department officers. After the city was firebombed, he eventually spiraled out of control, making bad decisions and was "dealt with" by Dawn. Hanson is later seen in a photograph in Dawn's office along with his nameplate and badge. According to the badge, his rank was Captain. Hanson is mentioned by Beth Greene when she asked Dawn about his history and what had happened to him. Dawn replies that Hanson was her mentor. Later, Hanson is the topic for a quarrel between Dawn and O'Donnell which ended with the death of the latter.
Death[]: Killed By Dawn Lerner According to Dr. Edwards, Hanson began to make poor decisions, leading to Dawn killing him and taking charge.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Hanson has killed: Numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Trivia[]: Hanson is the first named member of the Grady Memorial Hospital group to die, albeit off-screen and at some point before the hospital's appearance in Season 5.
Name: Hanson
